books.title: Green Forest Stories
books.author: Thornton W. Burgess
books.summary: A collection of four animal tales featuring the denizens of the Green Forest.

books.title: A High Wind in Jamaica
books.author: Richard Hughes
books.summary: After their parents’ plantation in Jamaica is destroyed by a hurricane, a group of children returning to England are kidnapped by pirates.

books.title: Twenty Years at Hull House
books.author: Jane Addams
books.summary: Jane Addams’ autobiographical account of the founding and operation of Hull House, one of America’s most famous settlement homes.

books.title: Eminent Victorians
books.author: Lytton Strachey
books.summary: Four witty and biting biographies of Victorians that take aim at the moral superiority of their subject’s time.

books.title: The Enchanted Castle
books.author: E. Nesbit
books.summary: Three children discover a wonderful garden and castle, and come into possession of a magic ring which entangles them in many strange adventures.

books.title: Getting Married
books.author: George Bernard Shaw
books.summary: On the morning of a young couple’s wedding, concerns about what is to come inspire discussions about the institution of marriage.

books.title: Coriolanus
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: A famous Roman general wants to run for consul.

books.title: The Gods of Pegāna
books.author: Lord Dunsany
books.summary: A mysterious god creates a cosmic pantheon to rule over its worlds and time.

books.title: Framley Parsonage
books.author: Anthony Trollope
books.summary: A young vicar with an aristocratic patron foolishly becomes mired in debt.

books.title: The Magician
books.author: W. Somerset Maugham
books.summary: A young engaged couple meet a mysterious man who claims to have practical knowledge of the occult.

books.title: Running a Thousand Miles for Freedom
books.author: William Craft
books.summary: The authors escape from slavery by posing as a slaveowner and his slave.

books.title: The Man in the Queue
books.author: Josephine Tey
books.summary: A police inspector is baffled by the case of a man who was stabbed while waiting in a theater queue.

books.title: My Disillusionment in Russia
books.author: Emma Goldman
books.summary: Emma Goldman recounts her experiences living in the early Soviet Union.

books.title: Essays
books.author: Errico Malatesta
books.summary: A collection of essays by Errico Malatesta.

books.title: The Rubáiyát of Omar Khayyám
books.author: Omar Khayyám
books.summary: Three volumes of lyrical quatrains about the joys of living, the meaning of existence, and what it means to lead a happy life.

books.title: The Little Nugget
books.author: P. G. Wodehouse
books.summary: The ambitious fiancée of an English gentleman asks him to kidnap the son of an American businessman from boarding school, before professional kidnappers get to him first.

books.title: Omega
books.author: Camille Flammarion
books.summary: A comet threatens to collide with the Earth, perhaps bringing about the end of the world.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Selma Lagerlöf
books.summary: A collection of Selma Lagerlöf’s translated short stories, ordered by date of publication.

books.title: Demian
books.author: Hermann Hesse
books.summary: A boy goes on a journey of spiritual growth.

books.title: The Innocents Abroad
books.author: Mark Twain
books.summary: Mark Twain travels abroad, offering witty observations on the places and cultures he encounters and commentary on the habits and foibles of his fellow travelers.
